comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content:
A beauty of a picture and an in flight picture, which were relatively rare then. The identification of the machine is at fault though as it is of the same manufacturer the Royal Aircrat Factory (RAF). This tractor biplane is a B.E.2 which came in several variants. Very typical is the form of the rudder which ca be clearly seen in your picture.

Great image, thanks for viewing.
